titles.title: Pledging, with never reserve or recall!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Half-hearted? Master, shall any who know Thee Grudge Thee their lives, Who has laid down Thine own? Nay! We would offer the hearts that we owe Thee Live for Thy love and Thy glory alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sisters, dear sisters, the call us resounding Will ye not echo the silver refrain Mighty and sweet, and in gladness abounding? “Truehearted, whole-hearted!” ringing again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is with us, His rest is before us Brightly His standard in waving above Sisters, dear sisters, in gathering chorus Peal out the watchword of courage and love{/lang-eng}
